EmailTemplate.name: Autumn 15 - BRUM Top Up Hours
EmailTemplate.subject: YOU'RE ALMOST THERE...... Finish your hours with The HeadStart team!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
We've noticed you're almost there and have logged a few hours but not quite hit that magic 16 hours yet to get access to the workshops and job interviews. We're offering you an exclusive opportunity to volunteer over a couple of Saturdays on a HeadStart project creating a short advertising film for a local charity. Sign up Here!
http://goo.gl/forms/epNbfRvCY8
(Deadline Monday 25th Jan)
